key_features: Dynamic category page with Next.js App Router params
Static generation with generateStaticParams for SEO optimization
Metadata generation for OG tags and Twitter cards
Suspense boundary with loading fallback UI
Responsive grid layout for blog cards
Error handling with notFound() for invalid categories
dependencies: CMS library functions - getPostsByCategory, getAllCategories, getAllPostsMeta

patterns_discovered.description: Uses generateStaticParams to pre-render all category pages at build time, improving performance and SEO
patterns_discovered.benefit: Faster page loads and better search engine indexability

patterns_discovered.description: Implements comprehensive metadata including OpenGraph and Twitter card tags for social sharing
patterns_discovered.benefit: Improved social media sharing and search engine visibility

patterns_discovered.description: Uses React Suspense with loading skeleton UI while content loads
patterns_discovered.benefit: Better user experience during data fetching

patterns_discovered.description: Maintains hardcoded category descriptions for each slug with fallback
patterns_discovered.benefit: Customized messaging per category without database dependency

patterns_discovered.description: Mobile-first responsive grid using Tailwind CSS breakpoints

gotchas_discovered.description: Post filtering uses case-insensitive comparison (toLowerCase) but category slug from params may not match
gotchas_discovered.impact: Could miss posts if category slug casing differs between params and data

gotchas_discovered.description: Category descriptions are hardcoded in the component with a fallback that references category.name variable outside its scope
gotchas_discovered.impact: Potential runtime error if category slug doesn't match descriptions object and fallback is used

gotchas_discovered.description: notFound() is called but category.count property is used without guarantee it exists in the data structure
gotchas_discovered.impact: Could break if category data structure doesn't include count property

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: No error boundary for CMS function failures
gotchas_discovered.description: getAllCategories() and getAllPostsMeta() calls have no error handling
gotchas_discovered.impact: Page will crash if CMS functions throw errors

approach_outcome.completeness: Fully implemented with proper Next.js patterns
key_accomplishments: Created dynamic category page component with proper Next.js App Router conventions
Implemented static generation for performance and SEO
Added comprehensive metadata for search engines and social media
Built responsive UI with loading states
Included proper 404 handling for non-existent categories
Added helpful category descriptions and article counts
approach_outcome.approach_used: Next.js best practices with static generation, metadata optimization, and progressive enhancement

recommendations.recommendation: Add try-catch blocks around CMS function calls (getAllCategories, getAllPostsMeta) to gracefully handle data loading failures
Move category descriptions to a centralized configuration file or database to reduce duplication and improve maintainability
Ensure category slug normalization (consistent casing) is applied consistently across data retrieval to prevent filtering mismatches
Add unit tests for edge cases: non-existent categories, empty category results, and category slug casing variations
Consider implementing pagination for categories with many articles to maintain optimal page load performance
Add aria-labels to the category badge and breadcrumb navigation for improved screen reader support
